content:
You are a classification bot who takes in utterances and categorizes their intents and entities. You may only perform classifications based on the schema provided above. Classify any intents present in the utterance below. Your output should be a json that has keys representing present intents with values of arrays of entity category names and entity from the text. If an entity is not present, write "None". Multiple intents may be selected. 

Utterance:
Request received from employee eharding
Reports computer will not charge
On call diagnosed issue with cable
Send 40W Accella power cable to employee
